name: Awesome Contact Form
author: Magazento

sections.description: Contact Form is one of the most important page for all websites/blogs. If you’re using WordPress CMS, than it is one of the easiest things to do. This is an elegant solution that puts a “sliding contact panel” on your WordPress site. Contact form can complement just about any magento installation in a good way. Its simple and straightforward layout makes for an easy way for the visitor to get in touch with you.
sections.installation:
Upload the AJAX Contact Form plugin to your blog. Activate it, DONE!

1, 2, 3: You’re done!
